tipCleanUnchanged: Modified original text will be preserved, while unchanged text will be deleted.
tipPrevious: Keep the notes of the current paragraph and view the content of the previous fragment.
tipNext: Keep the notes of the current paragraph and view the content of the next fragment.
tipSkip: Delete the notes of the current paragraph and continue to the next fragment.
tipAddDocCard: Create a flashcard for the current document.
tipDelDocCard: Delete the flashcard for the current document without affecting the flashcards within the document.
tipQuit: Keep the notes of the current paragraph. Exit learning.
tipNextBook: Keep the notes of the current paragraph. View other documents included in the [Progressive Learning] plugin.
tipIgnore: Stop pushing this book. You can reopen it in [View All Progressive Learning Documents].
FailToNewDoc: Failed to create a new document. Please try again later...
thisIsFirstPage: This is already the first page
thisIsLastPage: This is already the last page
AddADocFirst: You haven't added any documents yet.
cannotFindDocWaitForIndex: Document not found. Please rebuild the index or wait for the index to finish building.
opsInOriDocOrAddIt: Please perform operations in the original article. If you still can't find this content, try adding the document to the Progressive Learning plugin.
addThisDocFirst: Please add this document to Progressive Learning first.
opsInOriDoc: Please perform operations in the original article. This is just a reading fragment!
splitByWordCount: Split by word count (0 means no splitting based on word count)
splitByHeadings: Split by headings of each level
maybeBookRemoved: It seems that {bookID} has been removed.
openingDocPieceForYou: Opening the document fragment for you. Please wait...
cannotFindTheBox: Cannot find the notebook corresponding to the document:
slowDownALittleBit: ‚è≥Please wait for the index to be built... Then continue with your operation...
